title: Cave Dweller
author: XP Games
description:
The terrifying Cave Dweller has arrived officially in Bedrock! This entity stalks the deep dark, watching from the shadows before striking. Experience true horror in your caves with custom animations, spine-chilling sounds, and a relentless hunter that evolves as you play. 

Features:
- Official Cave Dweller entity
- Dynamic stalking AI
- Custom jumpscares and horror atmosphere
- Immersive 3D sound design
- Compatible with your existing survival worlds
